mapper.select: select count(*) from board where email=#{email}
select count(*) from board where b_title like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') OR b_content like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') OR b_name like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%')

select * from (select rownum numrow,A.* from (select * from board where b_title like '%'||#{find}||'%' OR b_content like '%'||#{find}||'%' order by b_ref desc,b_step asc) A) where numrow > #{startrow} and numrow <= #{endrow}
select * from board where b_title like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') OR b_content like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') OR b_name like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') order by b_ref desc limit #{startrow},#{endrow}
mapper.update: update board set b_hit = b_hit + 1 where b_seq = #{b_seq}
